metadata.title: CVE-2017-14643 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The AP4_HdlrAtom class in Core/Ap4HdlrAtom.cpp in Bento4 version 1.5.0-617uses an incorrect character data type, leading to a heap-based bufferover-read and application crash in AP4_BytesToUInt32BE in Core/Ap4Utils.h.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
